caption.p: Evaluation of Glide SP docking protocol on SARS Mpro inhibitors. a) Redocking of ligand 7 to the SARS Mpro active site (PDB 4MDS) resulted in 0.86 Å of r.m.s.d (root mean square deviation) between computational (pink) and x‐ray (cyan) poses. b) ROC curves and AUC obtained by docking 81 inhibitors and ∼4,000 decoys to the Mpro active site with Glide SP and XP protocols.
